name: Off By Heart
description:
Off by Heart is a 2D, point & click multi-linear narrative video game. Players are put in the role of Claire, who has reached a crossroads in her relationship with her boyfriend, Mark, as she begins to question whether their union is worth continuing.

Kat Siu -- Programming, Story, Script, Editor 

Jessica Yao -- Art Director, Character Art, Animation 

Michael Herman -- Story, Script, Environment Art, Prop Art
